name: Manasis Refrain
storyline:
The story of Manasis Refrain takes place in the continent of Fotania, where a world of mystical adventures begins, and a rare sighting of spirits and humans coexists in this land.

After a world threatening crisis caused by the Dark Lord, Fotania establishes “Theodoric Academy” to train the younger generation for the unforeseeable dangers in the future.

One day, our protagonist receives a letter from the Theodoric Academy…
“The Theodoric Academy invites you as a special student for enrollment. Please check the date written on the boarding pass and make your way to the Hakoniwa Island.”

– Sincerely, Griselda McWilliams,
Theodoric Academy Principal –
summary: Manasis Refrain is a 3D anime adventure-RPG set in a colorful fantasy world filled with equal measures mana and magic. Determined to combat the Dark Lord and his dastardly forces, civilization has established schools to specially train and educate promising young pupils. You are one such student on their first day at the academy - don't be late!
